info.name: Evan Feliza
info.title: Frontend Developer
info.about: As a computer engineering graduate transitioning into web development, I bring strong problem-solving skills to frontend programming. I'm currently building my expertise in modern JavaScript, React, and responsive design while applying my technical foundation to create efficient, user-friendly interfaces. Every project helps me bridge the gap between software principles and practical web development.

projects.title: Barangay Inhabitant Viewer
projects.description: A web application that works offline, providing tools to view and analyze inhabitant records, family details, and household information through interactive dashboards.
